rows.label: tlk70000005_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Laura-san! You looked really
cool at the award ceremony!

rows.label: tlk70000005_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I thought it was a real special event,
so I got my dad to take care of the
inn on his own so I could go.

rows.label: tlk70000005_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I was still a bit late
for it, though...

rows.label: tlk70000005_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I was trying to figure out what to
wear, and Joey was like, "hurry up!"
and "what's the big deal?"...

rows.label: tlk70000005_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Like, doesn't he understand that
you can't just roll up to a formal
event in regular clothes?

rows.label: tlk70000005_03_msg0006
rows.name:
I was just trying to show a bit
of respect for the occasion. But
he doesn't get it. Idiot...
